title: GPT booting x64 Windows on EFI

forumNotes.author: breaker
forumNotes.content:
So, are there many motherboards out there yet using EFI for PCs? It seems like MS and the mobo companies want to go the way of EFI/GPT but it slow to change.
So, I was just wondering if anyone had an EFI mobo and tried GPT booting an x64 version of Windows. Thanks, :smile: breaker
